scripts.network: hc sandbox clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=$(get-port) concurrently "npm run start --workspace ui" "npm run launch:happ"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm run test --workspace tests
scripts.network:tauri: hc sandbox clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=$(get-port) concurrently "npm run start --workspace ui" "npm run launch:tauri" "holochain-playground"
scripts.launch:tauri: concurrently "kitsune2-bootstrap-srv --listen $BOOTSTRAP_PORT" "echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/DinoAdventure.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT""
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package --workspace ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace ui && npm run format --workspace tests && cargo fmt
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace ui && npm run lint --workspace tests && cargo fmt --all -- --check && cargo clippy --all-targets --all-features -- --deny warnings
